text: Renyi Zhang is an American geoscientist, currently a University Distinguished Professor and Harold G. Haynes Chair at Texas A&M; Universityhttps://atmo.tamu.edu/people/profiles/faculty/zhangrenyi.html and an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Sciencehttps://www.aaas.org/fellows/2016 and American Geophysical Union.https://news.agu.org/press-release/agu-announces-2012-fellows/ ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:Texas A&M; University faculty Category:American geochemists Category:Massachusetts Institute of Technology alumni Category:University of Nevada alumni
title: Renyi Zhang
